robeger writes:
> It surprised me too, but I was feeding it a .au domain, and it
> wouldn't crawl anything until I removed au from the exclusion list.
> 
> Here's the crawl log entry:
> 20041206201135862   -63          -
> http://www.goldendragonpalace.com.au/ - - no-type #001 - - -
> 
> As soon as I remove "au" from the filter regexp heritrix crawls the
> site correctly.  I tried adding a trailing "/" to the URL in my seed
> list, same result.

Weird. Well, now we know. :-)

    -tree
